data.title: Trademark for Hookah and B Long Entrance
data.description: Use this easy, yet effective Trademark lineup to detect both Attackers jumping out of Hookah and entering from Garden. Players towards B Long won't be able to shoot the trip if placed in the video like so, but there will be a little gap for a potential lurk.

data.title: Standard A Site Showers and Short Trademark
data.description: Use either one of these two Trademark spots when defending the A Site. For showers, you can place the trip either high or low.

data.title: Start Round Top Truck Rendezvous Off-Angle
data.description: Catch Attackers off guard with this simple off-angle towards the A Site. You can hold onto your Rendezvous once you take it back when getting on top of Truck.

data.title: Aggressive and Passive B Long Rendezvous
data.description: Use this simple setup to hold an aggressive position on enemy players peeking into B Long.
